constituent: look back, employ, door, one, ceiling, flag, turkey, head, page, one, ceiling, drop, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight
koohiiStory1: I was EMPLOYED to give HEAD...when I look back, maybe that was not a wise career move.
koohiiStory2: The people we employ are always turning their heads to look back. They don´t want to be caught playing solitare on company time.
words: 顧みる(かえりみる): to look back, to turn around, to review
